fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, visit a player. If theyâ€™re a member of the good team, turn them into an orb.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Orbs cannot speak in day chat or whisper, nor can they vote or act at night. However, they do not count as dead.
- If any player tries to attack you and fails to kill you, you will automatically turn them into an orb
- Everyone is notified when a player is turned into an orb

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: have the good team be an orb or lose, you may win while dead
